person.persName: Robert G. Purdy (Marion County, KY, blacksmith and soldier (U.S.A.))

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel and Elizabeth Purdy. Blacksmith in Marion County in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as sergeant from October 28, 1861 to September 31, 1863. Served in 37th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from October 24, 1863 to December 29, 1864.
